casebody.data:
HARRIS-OFFUT
v.
NC BOARD OF LPC. No. 3P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Romallus O. Murphy, Greensboro, for Harris-Offut. William H. Borden, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Board of LPC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of January 2006 by Plaintiff for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2006."
